mapper.insert: insert into t_goods (goods_id, goods_name, goods_miaoshu, goods_pic, market_price, mall_price, catelog_id, stock_num, goods_address, enter_date) values (#{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsMiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mallPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{catelogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enterDate,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update t_goods set goods_name = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_miaoshu = #{goodsMiaoshu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goods_pic = #{goodsPic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, market_price = #{marketPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mall_price = #{mallPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, catelog_id = #{catelogId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stock_num = #{stockNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_address = #{goodsAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enter_date = #{enterDate,jdbcType=DATE} where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select goods_id, goods_name, goods_miaoshu, goods_pic, market_price, mall_price, catelog_id, stock_num, goods_address, enter_date from t_goods where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select goods_id, goods_name, goods_miaoshu, goods_pic, market_price, mall_price, catelog_id, stock_num, goods_address, enter_date from t_goods
goods_name like #{_keyword}
select goods_id, goods_name, goods_miaoshu, goods_pic, market_price, mall_price, catelog_id, stock_num, goods_address, enter_date from t_goods limit 5
select goods_id, goods_name, goods_miaoshu, goods_pic, market_price, mall_price, catelog_id, stock_num, goods_address, enter_date from t_goods order by goods_id desc limit 5
